data.title: Bottoms Rung
data.statement:
You are given a list of [[N]] uppercase words.  Starting with the first word in the list, create a word ladder where only one letter in the same position is different between each adjacent pair of words in the sequence (e.g. SHOOT->SHORT).  Find the last word in the ladder.

Example:
COLD
CORD
CARD
WARD
WARM

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read ROW:string(256)
write last word
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>>  [[N]]umber of words.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> The word list.
data.outputDescription: The last word in the ladder.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a list of N uppercase words. Starting with the first word in the list, create a word ladder where only one letter in the same position is different between each adjacent pair of words in the sequence (e.g. SHOOT->SHORT). Find the last word in the ladder.

Example:
COLD
CORD
CARD
WARD
WARM
Input
Line 1: Number of words.
Next N lines: The word list.
Output
The last word in the ladder.
Constraints
N ≤ 300
Example
Input
5
COLD
WARD
CARD
WARM
CORD
Output
WARM
